title: ICE: impl declared before trait with associated item

labels.name: A-associated-items
labels.description: Area: Associated items such as associated types and consts.

body:
```
#![feature(associated_types)]

impl Foo for int {
    type A = uint;
}

pub trait Foo {
    type A;
}

pub fn main() {}
```
